ModMetaData.name: Pale Genies
ModMetaData.author: ChewyYui
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Race Expanded - Genie is pretty cool, I like the artwork of the genie with silvery-white skin. In game they show up with baseliner skin pigmentations. This just gives them the Sheer White and Light Gray skin genes, so they too can be silvery-white like the artwork.
